| A tinker gnome:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is a gnome.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                     |

A **tinker gnome** is a member of the [gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(monster_class\) "Gnome (monster class)") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") added in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

Tinker gnomes have the same [base level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level") and [difficulty](/wiki/Difficulty_level "Difficulty level") as [gnomish wizards](/wiki/Gnomish_wizard "Gnomish wizard"), but do not [cast spells](/wiki/Monster_spellcasting "Monster spellcasting"). Instead, they cause trouble for their opponents by creating [gizmos](/wiki/Gizmo "Gizmo"). Besides this ability, they have a single melee attack identical to that of a regular [gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(monster\) "Gnome (monster)").

Like gnomish wizards, tinker gnomes are a specialized type that is not produced by any other type of gnome [growing up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up"), so they are somewhat uncommon.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Tinker_gnome\&action=edit)*
html:
Tinker gnome

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
G tinker gnome (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, Tinker 0d0 spawn gizmos
G tinker gnome (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, Tinker 0d0 spawn gizmos

Base level 3
Base experience 36
Speed 6
Base AC 4
Base MR 10
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 700
Nutritional value 120
Size small

A tinker gnome:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is a gnome.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • cannot be tamed.

A tinker gnome is a member of the gnome monster class added in dNetHack.

Tinker gnomes have the same base level and difficulty as gnomish wizards, but do not cast spells. Instead, they cause trouble for their opponents by creating gizmos. Besides this ability, they have a single melee attack identical to that of a regular gnome.

Like gnomish wizards, tinker gnomes are a specialized type that is not produced by any other type of gnome growing up, so they are somewhat uncommon.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Tinker_gnome&oldid=128008"

A '''tinker gnome''' is a member of the [[Gnome (monster class)|gnome]] [[monster class]] added in [[dNetHack]].

Tinker gnomes have the same [[Monster level|base level]] and [[Difficulty level|difficulty]] as [[gnomish wizard]]s, but do not [[Monster spellcasting|cast spells]]. Instead, they cause trouble for their opponents by creating [[gizmo]]s. Besides this ability, they have a single melee attack identical to that of a regular [[Gnome (monster)|gnome]].

Like gnomish wizards, tinker gnomes are a specialized type that is not produced by any other type of gnome [[grow up|growing up]], so they are somewhat uncommon.
